attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe the BBFC should not be allowed to ban any film, dvd or video game. Classification has its place in restricting what children can buy and as a guide for parents on what to let there children watch. As an adult I have to take responsibility for my own actions but I do not have the responsibility to choose what I want to watch or play in my own home.
